scripts.all: npm run imagemin-giflossy && npm run imagemin-gifsicle && npm run imagemin-jpegtran && npm run imagemin-mozjpeg && npm run imagemin-optipng && npm run imagemin-optipng && npm run imagemin-pngquant && npm run imagemin-svgo && npm run imagemin-webp && npm run low-quality-image-placeholders
scripts.imagemin-giflossy: cd imagemin-giflossy && rm -rf results && mkdir results && node do.js > results/summary.json
scripts.imagemin-gifsicle: cd imagemin-gifsicle && rm -rf results && mkdir results && node do.js > results/summary.json
scripts.imagemin-jpegtran: cd imagemin-jpegtran && rm -rf results && mkdir results && node do.js > results/summary.json
scripts.imagemin-mozjpeg: cd imagemin-mozjpeg && rm -rf results && mkdir results && node do.js > results/summary.json
scripts.imagemin-optipng: cd imagemin-optipng && rm -rf results && mkdir results && node do.js > results/summary.json
scripts.imagemin-pngquant: cd imagemin-pngquant && rm -rf results && mkdir results && node do.js > results/summary.json
scripts.imagemin-svgo: cd imagemin-svgo && rm -rf results && mkdir results && node do.js > results/summary.json
scripts.imagemin-webp: cd imagemin-webp && rm -rf results && mkdir results && node do.js > results/summary.json
scripts.low-quality-image-placeholders: cd low-quality-image-placeholders && rm -rf results && mkdir results && node do.js > results/summary.json
